About.Name: Leslie Garcia
About.AboutText: Hi, I'm Leslie Garcia, a mechanical engineering graduate from Seattle Pacific University motivated for growth and wanting to help bring innovation. I am currently preparing to take the Fundamentals of Engineering (FE) exam and seeking opportunities to apply my skills in real-world settings. TODO: complete this description.

Experience.EducationText: Graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering where I worked in interdisciplinary teams during my junior and senior year. My senior capstone project involved not only technical skills but also collaboration and project management. TODO: complete this description.
Experience.EmploymentText: During my time here, I not only did design work and load calculations, but I also became experienced in commissioning tasks. Doing these tasks helped me learn more about HVAC systems and project documentation. TODO: complete this description.
Experience.SkillsText: I am very experienced in using SOLIDWORKS to design and 3D print. I have some experience in SOLIDWORKS finite element analysis (FEA) and animation. I did basic tasks in AutoCAD, Revit, and Trace. I am proficient in MATLAB and Excel, and have basic skills in LabVIEW. TODO: complete this description.

Project1.Title: CoastClear
Project1.Desc: Senior Design Capstone project of a beach cleaning robot with an interdisciplinary team of mechanical, electrical, and computer engineering students.

Project2.Title: Thermal Design Exploration with MATLAB
Project2.Desc: Heat Transfer group project utilizing MATLAB. We were tasked to find the mathematical models for our DIY air conditioner, create a script to automate predictions for different variables. TODO: complete this description.

Project3.Title: Experimental Methods I
Project3.Desc: Classwork from experimental methods course to gain basic experience in LabVIEW. TODO: complete this description.
